name: Minimum Version
author: Steven Almeroth

sections.description:
Looks at all your plugins on your site and determines the minimum WordPress version that each one needs to run.

The following limitations are currently in place:

* Only determines if WordPress version 3.0 is required or not * Only looks in the standard plugin directory * Only looks at the main plugin file * Only looks at hooks, not functions * The included hooks list may be out of date and/or incomplete

short_description: Looks at all your plugins on your site and determines the minimum Wordpress version that each one needs to run the hooks.
